FuncDef:
The source-port command sets the source port number for an NQA UDP jitter test instance.
The undo source-port command restores the default source port number. The source-port command sets the source port number for an NQA UDP jitter test instance. The undo source-port command restores the default source port number. By default, the source port number is 0, and the system automatically allocates the port number.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the source port number for an NQA test instance.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 65535.

ExtraInfo: To set the source port number for an NQA test instance, run the source-port command.
